Articles.Content:
Greetings forum lurkers, avid kerbolnauts, rocket surgeons, and KSP fans. I am mattyp2109. I am a recent addition to even viewing the forums, but have logged 222 hours in KSP. Just several gameplay hours ago I completed my first docking (yay) and felt a new bond. A new connection with KSP that would only be right for me to get active on the forums.

Anywho, just saying hello, whats up, how do you do to all of you.
Hello, and welcome to the forums! We hope you will enjoy your stay.
Welcome aboard! I'm right there with you; that first docking is always something special.
